an7.10:1: "Sattimāni, bhikkhave, saṁyojanāni. Katamāni satta? Anunayasaṁyojanaṁ, paṭighasaṁyojanaṁ, diṭṭhisaṁyojanaṁ, vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ, mānasaṁyojanaṁ, issāsaṁyojanaṁ, macchariyasaṁyojanaṁ. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, satta saṁyojanānī"ti.
an7.10:2: Dve piyāni balaṁ dhanaṁ,Saṅkhittañceva vitthataṁ;Uggaṁ saṁyojanañceva,Pahānaṁ macchariyena cāti.
